Title 1: How to Look Confident, Especially When You Are Feeling Low - MindAdda
Meta Description 1: The challenge is to look confident when you miss it the most!Most of us experienced the scary feel that sends the chill down our spine. We often end up envying the people who seem confident at all times. However, is it so? Are they really confident or merely pretending to be?According to a research every individual experience the self-doubt, the nervousness that dips down their confidence level but what they do well is overcome it or sometimes even fake it like they are super confident.You can overcome too and look super confident even if you are losing out your senses inside,Body language –Body language plays a vital role in making you appear as if you are loaded with confidence. Standing and sitting erect, keeping your chin up, let your hands free but not lose – are some of the body language tricks you must practice. Your body should always convey the message that you are calm and composed.Communicate more –Communicating and conveying amply helps you reduce your stress level. If you are surrounded by people in the party and you feel you are lacking the confidence simply go ahead and talk to them about any topic. You can talk about work, films, travel, music or anything that would be of mutual interest. This will not only establish a friendly foundation between you but would also release stress levels from your system.Make your mind believe –Perhaps you are losing your control on your wisdom/humor but do not let your mind digest it, as said above just trick your mind into believing the opposite. Make yourself believe that this is just another presentation that you are going to just rock. Tell yourself that fumbling/mumbling while speaking is just fine. Tell to yourself not to admit that you are scared at any point of time. The more you tend to accept the idea that you are confident the easier it would get to make others believe it.Visualize Scenarios –Visualizing good scenarios always, generates positivity. Suppose you have a scheduled presentation tomorrow then you needs to revive your confidence by visualizing that your seniors are impressed by your presentations and that you are gaining appreciation from boss/colleagues. Keeping positive thought like these help you stay composed and motivated throughout.Do not over think –Thinking about presentations/meetings is good but over thinking is dangerous. We humans have the tendency to over think and over imagine the circumstances and scenarios that may actually never take place. This thinking structure hampers your confidence to a greater extent hence over thinking is completely avoidable.Be Yourself –There is no better comfort zone than being yourself. The level of confidence you would gain by being yourself is unfathomable. So, do not attempt to pretend to be someone else. Do not try to compete with some imaginary/real personality. Always keep in mind that your rawness can provide you an abundance of confidence if only you begin to care less about other people.Most of us have this confidence beneath us, we believe in ourselves but we are scared to bring it to the fore just because we are scared of being rejected.  Confidence comes naturally to few while others merely need to learn several tricks. It is vital to own your confidence like a boss!Published by K Vijay VenkatVijay Venkat is a father, a trainer, and a lover of books. When he’s finished playing video games with his kid, you’ll likely find Venkat sharing his personal training and marketing anecdotes with students and acquaintances.

Title 1: How to Look Confident, Especially When You Are Feeling Low - MindAdda
Meta Description 1: The challenge is to look confident when you miss it the most!Most of us experienced the scary feel that sends the chill down our spine. We often end up envying the people who seem confident at all times. However, is it so? Are they really confident or merely pretending to be?According to a research every individual experience the self-doubt, the nervousness that dips down their confidence level but what they do well is overcome it or sometimes even fake it like they are super confident.You can overcome too and look super confident even if you are losing out your senses inside,Body language –Body language plays a vital role in making you appear as if you are loaded with confidence. Standing and sitting erect, keeping your chin up, let your hands free but not lose – are some of the body language tricks you must practice. Your body should always convey the message that you are calm and composed.Communicate more –Communicating and conveying amply helps you reduce your stress level. If you are surrounded by people in the party and you feel you are lacking the confidence simply go ahead and talk to them about any topic. You can talk about work, films, travel, music or anything that would be of mutual interest. This will not only establish a friendly foundation between you but would also release stress levels from your system.Make your mind believe –Perhaps you are losing your control on your wisdom/humor but do not let your mind digest it, as said above just trick your mind into believing the opposite. Make yourself believe that this is just another presentation that you are going to just rock. Tell yourself that fumbling/mumbling while speaking is just fine. Tell to yourself not to admit that you are scared at any point of time. The more you tend to accept the idea that you are confident the easier it would get to make others believe it.Visualize Scenarios –Visualizing good scenarios always, generates positivity. Suppose you have a scheduled presentation tomorrow then you needs to revive your confidence by visualizing that your seniors are impressed by your presentations and that you are gaining appreciation from boss/colleagues. Keeping positive thought like these help you stay composed and motivated throughout.Do not over think –Thinking about presentations/meetings is good but over thinking is dangerous. We humans have the tendency to over think and over imagine the circumstances and scenarios that may actually never take place. This thinking structure hampers your confidence to a greater extent hence over thinking is completely avoidable.Be Yourself –There is no better comfort zone than being yourself. The level of confidence you would gain by being yourself is unfathomable. So, do not attempt to pretend to be someone else. Do not try to compete with some imaginary/real personality. Always keep in mind that your rawness can provide you an abundance of confidence if only you begin to care less about other people.Most of us have this confidence beneath us, we believe in ourselves but we are scared to bring it to the fore just because we are scared of being rejected.  Confidence comes naturally to few while others merely need to learn several tricks. It is vital to own your confidence like a boss!Published by K Vijay VenkatVijay Venkat is a father, a trainer, and a lover of books. When he’s finished playing video games with his kid, you’ll likely find Venkat sharing his personal training and marketing anecdotes with students and acquaintances.

Title 1: The Art of Debating. What to Do? How to Do? - MindAdda
Meta Description 1: You can win an argument without raising your voice and in debates telling the truth should be the aim and NOT victory.While most of us agree that debate is fun, the process sometimes can be nerve-wracking, particularly for those who have a fear of public speaking. Fortunately, as with other things in life, practice makes us perfect. People who are debating can enhance their argumentation and delivery skills by adhering to a few simple tips.One of the most important tips when it comes to debating is to focus on attacking ideas rather than people. Attacking an opponent on a personal level only weakens the argument. Instead, debaters should look for flaws in their opponent’s reasoning and call the logic into question rather than the person.MindAdda - Tips to DebateStudents should avoid the use of words like “always,” “never,” “often” or “generally” because they make their arguments more vulnerable to attack from opponents.If they believe that their opponent is wrong about something, they should point it out in a tactful manner. For instance, instead of simply saying that an opponent is wrong, students should state that their opponent’s idea is mistaken and then back that up with support for why the idea is flawed.Students should not disagree with truths that are obvious or try to exaggerate evidence to suit their case. While it is acceptable to present an opinion, students should be careful to acknowledge that it is just an opinion rather than trying to present that opinion as a fact.Students should use appropriate tone of voice, maintain their composure throughout the debate and avoid bickering. If students remain focused on supporting their ideas and refuting the ideas of their opponents, they are likely to succeed.Here are few more tips on the art of debatePrepare -Mental rehearsal and visualization can calm your nerves and boost performanceDon't drift -Stay in the topic you are debating, don't move away and drift away to another topic(s)Listen -The art of debate also lays on your listening skills, so listen carefully what others are saying tooSpeak clearly -Be very clear in what you want to express, be concise and clearBe confident -Be confident right from your body language to the voice clarityUse non-verbal cues -Smile, move your hands and legs a bit, these gestures will point towards a strong non-verbal cueClear your position -Make your position very clear to the audience at the beginning, so they know what to expect from you while you are speaking If you have more ideas on the Art of debating please reach out to us on…Published by K Vijay VenkatVijay Venkat is a father, a trainer, and a lover of books.
